text: A bolt of lightning can reach temperatures of 30,000 Kelvin.
The inventor of the Segway died in a Segway accident.
Mosquitoes are the deadliest animal, killing about 1 million people annually.
The first computer bug was an actual insect.
A day on Jupiter is only 10 hours long.
The Pacific Ocean is larger than all the land on Earth combined.
Human teeth are as hard as shark teeth.
Cashews come from a fruit called the cashew apple.
Camels can drink 40 gallons of water at once.
Dolphins can stay awake for 15 days straight.
The heart of a blue whale is so large a child could crawl through its arteries.
Most lipstick contains fish scales.
A single thunderstorm can produce 100 million volts of electricity.
The surface area of a human lung is roughly the size of a tennis court.
Babies are born with 300 bones, but adults only have 206.
The longest hiccuping spree lasted 68 years.
A cat has 230 bones, while a human has 206.
The human body produces enough heat to boil a gallon of water in 30 minutes.
Your body has about 37 trillion cells.
A flock of starlings is called a murmuration.
The plastic at the end of a shoelace is called an aglet.
A group of giraffes is called a tower.
Human bone is stronger than concrete.
The average person produces enough saliva to fill 2 swimming pools.
Peppers contain more Vitamin C than oranges.
The word 'set' has the most definitions in English.
The dot over the 'i' is called a tittle.
A sneeze travels at about 100 miles per hour.
The total length of blood vessels in the human body is about 60,000 miles.
Lobsters were once considered food for the poor.
The human eye can detect about 10 million different colors.
A giraffe's tongue is about 20 inches long and prehensile.
Sunlight takes about 8 minutes to reach Earth.
A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus.
You are taller in the morning than in the evening.
Crows can use tools and solve complex puzzles.
The world's oldest known tree is over 5,000 years old.
Koalas and primates are the only animals with unique fingerprints.
A group of rhinos is called a crash.
The moon is 400 times smaller than the Sun but also 400 times closer.
A human sneeze can contain 100,000 germs.
The first product to have a barcode was Wrigley's gum.
Humans and dolphins are the only species that have sex for pleasure.
A newborn baby's head is about one-quarter of its body length.
The total weight of bacteria in the human body is about 4 pounds.
An ant can lift 50 times its own body weight.
The coldest place in the universe is the Boomerang Nebula.
Kangaroos can't walk backwards.
A cloud can weigh more than a million pounds.
Elephants can't jump.
The average person will shed about 40 pounds of skin in their lifetime.
A baby octopus is about the size of a flea.
Glass is made from sand.
Water expands when it freezes, unlike most substances.
An ostrich's eye is bigger than its brain.
The human brain uses 20% of the body's total energy.
There are more stars in space than grains of sand on Earth's beaches.
The electric chair was invented by a dentist.
A housefly hums in the key of F.
Dolphins have names for each other.
The average person walks the equivalent of 3 times around the world in their lifetime.
A group of jellyfish is called a smack.
Dragonflies have six legs but can't walk.
A cockroach can hold its breath for 40 minutes.
The pupil of an octopus is rectangular.
A cat's jaw can't move sideways.
The human heart beats about 100,000 times a day.
The praying mantis is the only insect that can turn its head.
A group of ravens is called an unkindness.
The longest recorded flight of a chicken is 13 seconds.
The human nose can detect over 1 trillion different scents.
Goldfish have a memory span longer than 3 seconds â€” actually months.
The world's smallest mammal is the bumblebee bat.
A hippopotamus can run faster than a human.
Flamingos can only eat with their heads upside down.
The first webcam was created to monitor a coffee pot.
A caterpillar has more muscles than a human.
The inventor of the AK-47 regretted creating it.
A single solar flare can release the energy of millions of nuclear bombs.
The Atlantic Ocean is saltier than the Pacific Ocean.
A day on Neptune lasts about 16 hours.
The average person will eat about 70 insects per year while sleeping.
Mount Everest grows about 4 mm per year.
A jiffy is 1/100th of a second.
The Atlantic Ocean grows 2.5 cm wider every year.
A cat's urine glows under black light.
The inventor of the telephone, Alexander Graham Bell, never called his wife or mother.
A group of unicorns is called a blessing.
The Amazon River produces 20% of Earth's oxygen.
The world's largest living organism is a honey fungus in Oregon.
A cockroach can live without its head for weeks.
The longest English word is pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis.
The speed of light is 299,792,458 meters per second.
A group of cats is called a clowder.
The human body contains enough iron to make a 3-inch nail.
A tiger's skin is striped, just like its fur.
The world's longest river is the Nile at 6,650 km.
Octopuses have copper-based blood.
The human stomach gets a new lining every 3-4 days.
A group of flamingos is called a flamboyance.
